mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN event_sorce s ON s.EVT_SRC_ID = c.EVT_SRC_ID
mapper.insert: insert into interface_cfg (INTERFACE_CFG_ID, EVT_SRC_ID, INTERFACE_NAME, INTERFACE_DESC, INTERFACE_NBR, INTERFACE_TYPE, PROVIDER, CALLER, PROTOCOL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{interfaceCfgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{evtSrcId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{protocolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update interface_cfg set EVT_SRC_ID = #{evtSrcId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, INTERFACE_NAME = #{interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERFACE_DESC = #{interfaceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERFACE_NBR = #{interfaceNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERFACE_TYPE = #{interfaceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDER = #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALLER = #{caller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROTOCOL_TYPE = #{protocolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INTERFACE_CFG_ID = #{interfaceCfgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select INTERFACE_CFG_ID, EVT_SRC_ID, INTERFACE_NAME, INTERFACE_DESC, INTERFACE_NBR, INTERFACE_TYPE, PROVIDER, CALLER, PROTOCOL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from interface_cfg where INTERFACE_CFG_ID = #{interfaceCfgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select INTERFACE_CFG_ID, EVT_SRC_ID, INTERFACE_NAME, INTERFACE_DESC, INTERFACE_NBR, INTERFACE_TYPE, PROVIDER, CALLER, PROTOCOL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from interface_cfg
